I love Csgo, in fact it's the only game i play on a regular basis. It is, in my opinion the leader in team based fps shooters.

Be warned though, Csgo can trigger outbursts of spontaneous rage, not just from yourself but other team members. Some can at times be very toxic;  however,  i have made many good friends playing this game and when you do happen upon a group of friendly team players you will have great time.
